mapper.delete: DELETE FROM rvw WHERE rvw_no = #{rvw_no} and usr_id = #{usr_id}
mapper.select: SELECT B.usr_nm, B.email, C.prd_nm FROM rvw A INNER JOIN usr B ON A.usr_id = B.usr_id INNER JOIN trv_prd C ON A.prd_cd = C.prd_cd WHERE B.usr_id = #{usr_id}

SELECT A.rvw_no, A.rvw_ttl, A.rvw_cont, A.wrt_nm, B.img_pth, A.rvw_reg_date, A.rvw_vcnt, A.lk_cnt FROM rvw A INNER JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd INNER JOIN usr C ON A.usr_id = C.usr_id ORDER BY A.rvw_no DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT A.rvw_ttl, A.rvw_cont, A.wrt_nm, B.img_pth, A.rvw_reg_date, A.rvw_vcnt, A.lk_cnt FROM rvw A INNER JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd INNER JOIN usr C ON A.usr_id = C.usr_id ORDER BY A.rvw_reg_date DESC, A.rvw_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rvw (usr_id, prd_cd, wrt_nm, wrt_email, rvw_ttl, rvw_cont) VALUES (#{usr_id}, #{prd_cd}, #{wrt_nm}, #{wrt_email}, #{rvw_ttl}, #{rvw_cont})
mapper.select: SELECT A.rvw_no, A.rvw_ttl, A.lk_cnt, A.wrt_nm, A.rvw_reg_date, A.rvw_vcnt, A.rvw_cont, B.img_pth, C.prd_nm FROM rvw A INNER JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd INNER JOIN trv_prd C ON A.prd_cd = C.prd_cd WHERE rvw_no = #{rvw_no};
mapper.update: UPDATE rvw SET rvw_ttl = #{rvw_ttl}, rvw_cont = #{rvw_cont}, rvw_reg_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE rvw_no = #{rvw_no} and wrt_nm = #{wrt_nm}
mapper.select: SELECT usr_id, usr_nm, email FROM usr WHERE usr_id = #{usr_id}

SELECT A.rvw_no, A.rvw_ttl, A.rvw_cont, A.wrt_nm, B.img_pth, A.rvw_reg_date, A.rvw_vcnt, A.lk_cnt FROM rvw A INNER JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd INNER JOIN usr C ON A.usr_id = C.usr_id WHERE true AND A.rvw_ttl LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY A.rvw_no DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM rvw A INNER JOIN prd_img B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd INNER JOIN usr C ON A.usr_id = C.usr_id WHERE true AND A.rvw_ttl LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY A.rvw_no DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
